AccessibilityHelper
AccessibilityHelper - Manages app-wide accessibility settings Features: - Large text mode (increases all text sizes by 30%) - High contrast mode (enables dark theme) - Larger touch targets (increases button sizes by 50%) User Story: As an entrant, I want accessibility options (e.g., large text, high contrast) Usage: 1.

Notification
Notification Model Represents an in-app notification for entrants Types: - LOTTERY_WON: Selected in lottery - LOTTERY_LOST: Not selected in lottery - EVENT_REMINDER: Reminder before event starts - ORGANIZER_MESSAGE: Custom message from organizer - INVITATION_SENT: Invited to sign up for event

ViewEntrantsActivity
ViewEntrantsActivity - View all entrants in different states Shows entrants in FIVE tabs: - Waiting List (people who joined) - Selected (people who won lottery, awaiting response) - Attending (people who accepted - FINAL LIST) - Declined (people who declined invitation) - Log (replacement draw history) US 02.02.01: View waiting list US 02.06.01: View chosen entrants US 02.06.02: See cancelled entrants (DECLINED TAB) US 02.06.03: See final list (ATTENDING TAB) US 02.06.04: View replacement log
